com.philips.platform.appinfra.rest.hpkp

Interface HPKPInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HPKPManager

    public interface HPKPInterface
    The SSL Public Key pinning Interface .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPinnedCertificateMatching(java.lang.String hostName, java.util.List<java.security.cert.X509Certificate> chain)
      Validate if the stored public key for a particular hostname matches the public key in the chain of certificates for the same hostname
      void updatePinnedPublicKey(java.lang.String hostName, java.lang.String publicKeyDetails)
      Persistently store and update public key for a particular hostname.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePinnedPublicKey

        void updatePinnedPublicKey(java.lang.String hostName,
                           java.lang.String publicKeyDetails)
        Persistently store and update public key for a particular hostname. If there is a mismatch in the stored value and the provided value, new value is to be updated.
        Parameters:
        hostName - hostname of a URL which would be used as key to store the public key in secure storage
        publicKeyDetails - Public key details of a particular hostname received in response header
        Since:
        1802.0

      • isPinnedCertificateMatching

        boolean isPinnedCertificateMatching(java.lang.String hostName,
                                    java.util.List<java.security.cert.X509Certificate> chain)
        Validate if the stored public key for a particular hostname matches the public key in the chain of certificates for the same hostname
        Parameters:
        hostName - country code to persistently store, code must be according to ISO 3166-1
        chain - Chain of certificates provided by the server for a particular hostname.
        Since:
        2018.2.0
